code: import React from'react';import{BarChart,Bar,XAxis,YAxis,CartesianGrid,Tooltip,ResponsiveContainer}from'recharts';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TransactionsChart=()=>{const data=[{month:'يناير',completed:120,pending:25},{month:'فبراير',completed:145,pending:30},{month:'مارس',completed:165,pending:20},{month:'أبريل',completed:190,pending:15},{month:'مايو',completed:175,pending:35},{month:'يونيو',completed:200,pending:40}];const CustomTooltip=_ref=>{let{active,payload,label}=_ref;if(active&&payload&&payload.length){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-3 rounded-lg shadow-lg border border-gray-200",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2",children:label}),payload.map((entry,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{color:entry.color},children:[entry.dataKey==='completed'?'المكتملة':'المعلقة',": ",entry.value]},index))]});}return null;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:'100%',height:300},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResponsiveContainer,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(BarChart,{data:data,margin:{top:20,right:30,left:20,bottom:5},barCategoryGap:"20%",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartesianGrid,{strokeDasharray:"3 3",stroke:"#f0f0f0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{dataKey:"month",axisLine:false,tickLine:false,tick:{fill:'#6b7280',fontSize:12}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{axisLine:false,tickLine:false,tick:{fill:'#6b7280',fontSize:12}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CustomTooltip,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{dataKey:"completed",fill:"#10b981",radius:[4,4,0,0],name:"\u0645\u0643\u062A\u0645\u0644\u0629"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{dataKey:"pending",fill:"#f59e0b",radius:[4,4,0,0],name:"\u0645\u0639\u0644\u0642\u0629"})]})})});};export default TransactionsChart;
